Bahamuto Dynamics' GRS2

The GRS2 or Giant Robot Suit Mk.2 is now available to the public.

Download: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/103148235/Gundamesque%20Mk2.craft

Craft requires the following addons:

MagicSmokeIndustries(Infernal Robotics parts)

B9 Aerospace 3.3

KW Rocketry

Procedural Wings

Procedural Fairings

Dromoman Robotic Arms (will replace this when I get a chance)

If you try to load this and the game is missing a part, let me know so I can update this list.

Action Groups:

1, 2: Legs (Important for balancing CoM with CoT)

3,4: Arms (Not as important but may help with balancing. You can also mount weapons to the arms)

Flight Instructions

Note: This is just a toy. It can not get you to orbit or anywhere far at all. You can not walk.

1: Right when craft loads, enable RCS and SAS and try to balance the robot. After it settles, it should stand on its own without input.

2: Set throttle to full before staging.

3: Stage to enable thrusters. Immediately, hold action group "2" untill the legs are between the exhaust jets. If you don't do this, you will pitch forward and crash.

4: Try to adjust the leg position to balance the CoM with the CoT.

5: Fly around a bit and use the parachute to land.

6: To land on your feet, apply SAS and RCS in an upright position and use the leg and arm controls to create a balanced posture.

Flying!

Jump up, jump up,

And get down!

Edited October 25, 2013 by BahamutoD
